text: Leo Guntara (born 17 August 1994) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays for Semen Padang mainly as a left back but also as a left midfielder, on loan from PSM Makassar. ==Career== Leo is a Semen Padang F.C. player which has twice felt the Indonesia Super League U-21 title, when he joined Sriwijaya U-21 in 2013 and Semen Padang U-21 2014. He managed to bring Semen Padang U-21 won in the Indonesia Super League U-21 for the first time in this year after defeating Sriwijaya FC U-21. == Honours == === Club === Semen Padang * Liga 2 runner-up: 2018 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Bali United F.C. players Category:Living people Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Leo Guntara
